column4: has anybody got a link to a guide to install kde on one of the other desktops ?
so like, desktop 1 is gnome, desktop 2 is kde
OH.... ummm...you mean like on different workspaces, same session? no
ive heard of running a gnome session on one screen and a kde session on another, but remember two totally separate sessions. cant copy and paste between them or anything
of course, you can use kde apps in gnome just fine and the reverse as well
